title: WTB T207 cards in VG-EX+ range
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: WTB T207 cards in VG-EX+ range
posts.post_content: Looking for ungraded T207 cards in the VG-EX+ range. Send me a PM with what you have for sale. Thanks.

Hi Jeff,

    I have a few raw and graded in various grades - one or two may fall within your definition of VG-Ex+ ...  my Sale page is linked in my sig.  The raw T207s are [URL="http://imageevent.com/gspinf/forsaletrade/raw"]here[/URL].  Drop me a line if there's any interest.

Thanks!
--
Mike
